extendedInfo.description: APPKIK  is a FREE App manager and Advanced task killer.Key Features:â TASK KILLERâ¢ Kill the tasks which are taking too much ressources and do it with styleâ APP MANAGERâ¢ Find your latest downloaded appsâ¢ Back-up and restore your appsâ¢ Move apps to SDâ¢ Clear cacheâ¢ Favorites the apps your likeâ¢ Find easily the apps you've deletedâ¢ Uninstall multiple apps in one goâ¢ App Managerâ APP SHARINGâ¢ Share a list of best apps in one clickâ PRO VERSIONâ¢ To remove the ads and support the dev team,  you can purchase the pro key-----APPKIK is the result of 3 years of development to deliver the easiest App Manager and Task Killer. âSHARE APPS, KILL TASKS, MOVE 2 SD, BACK-UP AND EVEN FIND APPS YOU HAVE DELETED WITHOUT SAVING THEMâ-----Kik your apps with Appkik!Appkik is developed by Diune.On Twitter: @diune---Tags: Android app manager apkik apk ik kikapp appkick app kick taskiller taskkiller appkiller appmanager taskmanager process move2sd apps2sd appbackup appshare widget send applications share email appsharing clearcache clear cache appcache

reviews.title: App fixed
reviews.comment: App is fixed now. I had to uninstall then reinstall for it to work for me. I lost my deleted apps list however, which was one of my favorite features of the app. .

reviews.title: Long clicks very annoying
reviews.comment: Long clicks on apps bring up a menu. The animation used to bring up that menu is incredibly annoying, difference between 3 and 5 stars.

reviews.title: What name do I tell
reviews.comment: people?  I praise this app and then they can\'t find it because you\'ve changed the name.  Can the \"Play\" Store and my phone icon have the same name? PREV REVIEW: Had to reset  my phone and lost this app.  Been looking for you - love easy control of what\'s running, accessing most recent downloads, told when updates can go to SD card etc., backing up infrequently used apps for later use. Missed you! Thanks!
